alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 08 at 3:16AM CDT until June 09 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CDT /2 AM MDT/ THURSDAY FOR GUADALUPE PASS... * WHAT...Northeast winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe Pass. * WHEN...From 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ this evening to 3 AM CDT /2 AM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
